remarks: If a hyperplane is not closed, its closure equals the vector space. (Contributed by NM, 29-Oct-2014.)
statement:
dochshpncl.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dochshpncl.o $e |- ._|_ = ( ( ocH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dochshpncl.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dochshpncl.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
dochshpncl.y $e |- Y = ( LSHyp ` U ) $.
dochshpncl.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
dochshpncl.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. Y ) $.
dochshpncl $p |- ( ph -> ( ( ._|_ ` ( ._|_ ` X ) ) =/= X <-> ( ._|_ ` ( ._|_ ` X ) ) = V ) ) $.
